cards.flavor: Great hero or grand betrayer? The truth of Ezuri's legacy is clouded by the fog of legend.
cards.name: Ezuri, Renegade Leader
cards.text:
{G}: Regenerate another target Elf.
{2}{G}{G}{G}: Elf creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.

cards.flavor: "This is our land. We will not allow eyeblights to poison its beauty."
cards.name: Dwynen, Gilt-Leaf Daen
cards.text:
Reach
Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1.
Whenever Dwynen, Gilt-Leaf Daen attacks, you gain 1 life for each attacking Elf you control.

cards.flavor: Call one, call them all.
cards.name: Dwynen's Elite
cards.text: When Dwynen's Elite enters the battlefield, if you control another Elf, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.

cards.name: Elvish Aberration
cards.text:
{T}: Add {G}{G}{G}.
Forestcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Forest card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.)

cards.flavor: "The elves tend the forest, and the forest sustains the elves. My role is to ensure that the cycle continues."
cards.name: Elvish Archdruid
cards.text:
Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1.
{T}: Add {G} for each Elf you control.

cards.flavor: "How do the vinebred feel? Fah! We do not ask the puppet how it feels when the puppeteer bids it dance."
cards.name: Elvish Branchbender
cards.text: {T}: Until end of turn, target Forest becomes an X/X Treefolk creature in addition to its other types, where X is the number of Elves you control.

cards.flavor:
"Life grows everywhere. My kin merely find those places where it grows strongest."
—Nissa Revane
cards.name: Elvish Mystic
cards.text: {T}: Add {G}.

cards.flavor: "Our lives are woven together like the trees' branches over our heads, forming a canopy that protects us all."
cards.name: Elvish Vanguard
cards.text: Whenever another Elf enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Elvish Vanguard.

cards.flavor: Eyes and arrows trained ever skyward.
cards.name: Ezuri's Archers
cards.text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Whenever Ezuri's Archers blocks a creature with flying, Ezuri's Archers gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

cards.name: Fierce Empath
cards.text: When Fierce Empath enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost 6 or greater, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Gladehart Cavalry
cards.text:
When Gladehart Cavalry enters the battlefield, support 6. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to six other target creatures.)
Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it dies, you gain 2 life.

cards.flavor: "Skyknight gear? Well, I have drake-skin gauntlets, supple and fireproof. Or a ceratok chestplate that'll stop a crossbow bolt."
cards.name: Ivy Lane Denizen
cards.text: Whenever another green creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

cards.name: Jagged-Scar Archers
cards.text:
Jagged-Scar Archers's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Elves you control.
{T}: Jagged-Scar Archers deals damage equal to its power to target creature with flying.

cards.name: Krosan Tusker
cards.text:
Cycling {2}{G} ({2}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Krosan Tusker, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. (Do this before you draw.)

cards.flavor: Every leaf, tree, and building in Kujar has been placed to achieve maximum harmony, in accordance with the elvish philosophy known as the Great Conduit.
cards.name: Kujar Seedsculptor
cards.text: When Kujar Seedsculptor enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

cards.name: Lead the Stampede
cards.text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal any number of creature cards from among them and put the revealed cards into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.flavor: Eidren, perfect of Lys Alana, ordered hundreds of trees uprooted and rearranged into a pattern he deemed beautiful. Thus the Gilt-Leaf Wood was born.
cards.name: Leaf Gilder
cards.text: {T}: Add {G}.

cards.name: Llanowar Empath
cards.text: When Llanowar Empath enters the battlefield, scry 2, then reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put it into your hand. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

cards.flavor: The remains of ancient civilizations litter the run-down land.
cards.name: Naturalize
cards.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

cards.flavor: Many elves incorporate the beauty of nature into their inventions. Very few capture its savagery.
cards.name: Nature's Way
cards.text: Target creature you control gains vigilance and trample until end of turn. It deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.

cards.name: Nissa's Judgment
cards.text:
Support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.)
Choose up to one target creature an opponent controls. Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it deals damage equal to its power to that creature.

cards.flavor: It rarely moves, standing stock still in its clearing. When it does stir, ravens stop their cawing and crickets their chirping. All of nature watches in awed silence.
cards.name: Regal Force
cards.text: When Regal Force enters the battlefield, draw a card for each green creature you control.

cards.flavor: "The land gives of itself. Its abundance provides, even in times of chaos."
cards.name: Sylvan Advocate
cards.text:
Vigilance
As long as you control six or more lands, Sylvan Advocate and land creatures you control get +2/+2.

cards.flavor: The safewright Talara protects a delicate woodland waterfall. She has vowed to send wave after wave of warriors to slay any who would dare disturb its beauty.
cards.name: Talara's Battalion
cards.text:
Cast this spell only if you've cast another green spell this turn.
Trample

cards.flavor: She stands as a living symbol of the natural world and an enemy of the forces that threaten it.
cards.name: Viridian Shaman
cards.text: When Viridian Shaman enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.

cards.flavor:
"Life as we know it dangles on the brink of extinction. We must show the strength they would steal from us."
—The Invokers' Tales
cards.name: Wildheart Invoker
cards.text: {8}: Target creature gets +5/+5 and gains trample until end of turn.

cards.flavor: "I can call an army to my side in the blink of an eye. Best not blink."
cards.name: Yeva, Nature's Herald
cards.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
You may cast green creature spells as though they had flash.

cards.name: Oran-Rief, the Vastwood
cards.text:
Oran-Rief, the Vastwood enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G}.
{T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each green creature that entered the battlefield this turn.

cards.name: Tranquil Thicket
cards.text:
Tranquil Thicket enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G}.
Cycling {G} ({G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Treetop Village
cards.text:
Treetop Village enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G}.
{1}{G}: Treetop Village becomes a 3/3 green Ape creature with trample until end of turn. It's still a land. (If it would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

cards.name: Goblin Welder
cards.text: {T}: Choose target artifact a player controls and target artifact card in that player's graveyard. If both targets are still legal as this ability resolves, that player simultaneously sacrifices the artifact and returns the artifact card to the battlefield.

cards.flavor: The artificers of Kaladesh strive ceaselessly for perfection, progress, and the ultimate expression of elegance.
cards.name: Artificer's Epiphany
cards.text: Draw two cards. If you control no artifacts, discard a card.

cards.flavor: The greatest masters of the craft abandon tools altogether, shaping metal with hand and mind alone.
cards.name: Etherium Sculptor
cards.text: Artifact spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

cards.name: Faerie Mechanist
cards.text:
Flying
When Faerie Mechanist enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.flavor: The Neurok see the artificer as an archaeologist, clearing away falsehoods to see the truth hidden beneath.
cards.name: Riddlesmith
cards.text: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

cards.name: Treasure Mage
cards.text: When Treasure Mage enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost 6 or greater, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Trinket Mage
cards.text: When Trinket Mage enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost 1 or less, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

cards.flavor: "The tools of the past will help us forge the future."
cards.name: Trophy Mage
cards.text: When Trophy Mage enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost 3, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Whirler Rogue
cards.text:
When Whirler Rogue enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying.
Tap two untapped artifacts you control: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

cards.flavor: The elves had devised countless strategies to combat Memnarch's war machines, but they had no idea what to do when one was thrown at them.
cards.name: Barrage Ogre
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Barrage Ogre deals 2 damage to any target.

cards.name: Galvanic Blast
cards.text:
Galvanic Blast deals 2 damage to any target.
Metalcraft — Galvanic Blast deals 4 damage to that permanent or player instead if you control three or more artifacts.

cards.flavor: The metal must be pure. The hand must be steady. The product must be perfect.
cards.name: Ghirapur Gearcrafter
cards.text: When Ghirapur Gearcrafter enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. (A creature with flying can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

cards.name: Pia and Kiran Nalaar
cards.text:
When Pia and Kiran Nalaar enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying.
{2}{R}, Sacrifice an artifact: Pia and Kiran Nalaar deals 2 damage to any target.

cards.flavor: From trinket to trauma.
cards.name: Shrapnel Blast
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact.
Shrapnel Blast deals 5 damage to any target.

cards.flavor:
"The fires of invention burn in all of us. I fight for the freedom to unleash those flames."
—Pia Nalaar
cards.name: Welding Sparks
cards.text: Welding Sparks deals X damage to target creature, where X is 3 plus the number of artifacts you control.

cards.name: Maverick Thopterist
cards.text:
Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)
When Maverick Thopterist enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying.

cards.flavor: It's not wise to disturb an artist at work.
cards.name: Reclusive Artificer
cards.text:
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
When Reclusive Artificer enters the battlefield, you may have it deal damage to target creature equal to the number of artifacts you control.

cards.flavor:
"If there can be no victory, then I will fight forever."
—Koth of the Hammer
cards.name: Darksteel Plate

cards.flavor:
"It's the must-have gift for everyone on your list. Get one for yourself, too!"
—Chammi, curio vendor
cards.name: Filigree Familiar
cards.text:
When Filigree Familiar enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
When Filigree Familiar dies, draw a card.

cards.flavor:
"Our glorious infection has taken hold."
—Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite
cards.name: Ichor Wellspring
cards.text: When Ichor Wellspring enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

cards.name: Inventor's Goggles
cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+2.
Whenever an Artificer enters the battlefield under your control, you may attach Inventor's Goggles to it.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

cards.flavor: The oil created the mycosynth. The mycosynth created New Phyrexia.
cards.name: Mycosynth Wellspring
cards.text: When Mycosynth Wellspring enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Myr Battlesphere
cards.text:
When Myr Battlesphere enters the battlefield, create four 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature tokens.
Whenever Myr Battlesphere attacks, you may tap X untapped Myr you control. If you do, Myr Battlesphere gets +X/+0 until end of turn and deals X damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.

cards.flavor: For the Phyrexians, death is not an end, nor a one-time occurrence.
cards.name: Myr Sire
cards.text: When Myr Sire dies, create a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token.

cards.flavor: All the curiosity of the Neurok with only a trace of their duplicity.
cards.name: Neurok Replica
cards.text: {1}{U}, Sacrifice Neurok Replica: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

cards.flavor:
"Melt that which was never frozen."
—Spellbomb inscription
cards.name: Pyrite Spellbomb
cards.text:
{R}, Sacrifice Pyrite Spellbomb: It deals 2 damage to any target.
{1}, Sacrifice Pyrite Spellbomb: Draw a card.

cards.flavor: A masterwork of spite, inspired by madness.
cards.name: Scuttling Doom Engine
cards.text:
Scuttling Doom Engine can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.
When Scuttling Doom Engine dies, it deals 6 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.

cards.name: Solemn Simulacrum
cards.text:
When Solemn Simulacrum enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
When Solemn Simulacrum dies, you may draw a card.

cards.name: Thopter Assembly
cards.text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control no Thopters other than Thopter Assembly, return Thopter Assembly to its owner's hand and create five 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying.

cards.flavor: Voyager staffs are sought by those hoping to find an escape from the sprawling glut of Ravnica.
cards.name: Voyager Staff
cards.text: {2}, Sacrifice Voyager Staff: Exile target creature. Return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.flavor: Structures built from darksteel yield to neither assault nor age.
cards.name: Darksteel Citadel
cards.text:
Indestructible
{T}: Add {C}.

cards.flavor: All around the foundry, automatons unhitched themselves from their mounts and pivoted to face Chandra.
cards.name: Foundry of the Consuls
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{5}, {T}, Sacrifice Foundry of the Consuls: Create two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying.

cards.flavor: Kuldotha, wellspring of molten metal, temple of the goblin horde.
cards.name: Great Furnace
cards.text: {T}: Add {R}.

cards.flavor:
"So even the heart of our world has succumbed."
—Koth of the Hammer
cards.name: Phyrexia's Core
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: You gain 1 life.

cards.flavor: Lumengrid, site of the Knowledge Pool, source of vedalken arcana.
cards.name: Seat of the Synod
cards.text:
(Seat of the Synod isn't a spell.)
{T}: Add {U}.

cards.name: Shivan Reef
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {U} or {R}. Shivan Reef deals 1 damage to you.

cards.name: Swiftwater Cliffs
cards.text:
Swiftwater Cliffs enters the battlefield tapped.
When Swiftwater Cliffs enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {U} or {R}.

cards.name: Temple of Epiphany
cards.text:
Temple of Epiphany enters the battlefield tapped.
When Temple of Epiphany enters the battlefield, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
{T}: Add {U} or {R}.
